name: The Adventures of Capitano Navarro
description: A pirate on the sea of dreams navigates on a quest to save Verdefolhas, the fairy queen, from the terrible Buffoon, who seeks to create a chimerical empire in the oniric lands. However, in order to complete his mission, CAPITANO NAVARRO will need to face the challenges found in this psychedelic world!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 2,0 GHz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD2400 or NVIDIA GeForce 7600 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 755 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 11
recommended_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2,0 GHz CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD3800 or NVIDIA GeForce 8800 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 755 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 11
